GK16visa04cu:4: (lo, a) evaṃ kāvyasya svarūpamuktvā viśeṣaṃ nirūpayitumavatārayati--atheti---bhidyate aneneti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:9: vācyādadhikacamatkāriṇi vyaṅgyārthe dhvanyate 'sminniti vyutpattyā dhvanirnāmottamaṃ kāvyam /
GK16visa04cu:12: (vi, ka) kāvyalakṣaṇe kṛte tadeva kāvyaṃ katividhamityākāṅkṣāyāmāha---kāvyaṃ dhvanirityādi /
GK16visa04cu:13: dhvanyate 'sminniti--dhvanyate vyajyate vyaṅgyārthaḥ śabdādinā asmin kāvye ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:21: (lo, i) lakṣaṇābhidhā ca mūle kāraṇer'thād vyaṅgyāt vyañjane yayoḥ /
GK16visa04cu:22: yasya dhvaneḥ vyaṅgyārtharūpopādhilakṣaṇābhidhāmūlatvena dvaividhyapratipādanām tadupādhikasya kāvyasya dvaividhyam /
GK16visa04cu:34: atra hi vācyor'thaḥ svarūpaṃ prakāśayanneva vyaṅgyārthasya prakāśakaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:41: avivakṣitamiti---vācyāvivakṣāyāṃ bījamāha---bādhitasvarūpamiti---vācyatāvacchedakarūpeṇa vivakṣābhāvāt tena rūpeṇa bādho viśiṣṭābhāvarūpaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:42: tena ajahatsvārthātmikāyām upādānalakṣaṇāyāṃ vācyasyābādhe 'pi vācyatāvacchedakarūpeṇa tadvādhaḥṣa jahatsvārthāyāṃ tu arthayoreva bādhaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:50: avivakṣitavācye lakṣyor'thaḥ svarūpaṃ prakāśayan vyaṅgyārthaṃ prakāśayati,
GK16visa04cu:60: (lo, u) saṃkamiti iti --- yogakākvādisāhāyyasūcanaṃ vācye iti kākākṣinyāyenobhayatra sambadhyate /
GK16visa04cu:70: atyantaṃ tiraskṛta iti---vācyārthasyāvacchedakāntareṇāpi avivakṣaṇāt atyantaṃ tiraskāraḥ,
GK16visa04cu:77: atra dvitīyakadalyādiśabdāḥ paunaruktyabhiyā sāmānyakadalyādirūpe mukhyārthe bādhitā jāḍyādiguṇaviśiṣṭakadalyādirūpamarthaṃ bodhayanti /
GK16visa04cu:82: camūrudṛśaḥ hariṇekṣaṇāyāḥ ūruyugaṃ bhuvanatritaye 'pi kasyāpi tulāṃ sādṛśyaṃ na bibharttotyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:83: tathā ca tena kasyāpi sādṛśyādhāraṇāt ko 'pi tadupamānaṃ na astītyatrāha---kadalīti /
GK16visa04cu:84: kadalī rambhā karabhaḥ ūrvākāraḥ paṇipārśvabhāgaḥ“maṇibandhādākaniṣṭhaṃ karasya karabho bahiḥ “iti koṣāt /
GK16visa04cu:87: eṣu uddeśyeṣu dvitīyakadalyādipadānāṃ paunaruktyāt tadarthānāṃ vidheyatvāsambhavāt tāni padāni jāḍyādiviśiṣṭakadalyādiparāṇi /
GK16visa04cu:89: tataḥ kadalī jāḍyā karabho 'śobhanaḥ karirājakaraḥ karkaśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:91: yatra punaḥ svārthaṃ sarvathā parityajannarthāntare pariṇamati,
GK16visa04cu:95: (lo, ū) atyantatiraskṛta iti kārikāpadārthaṃ vivṛṇoti---yatra punariti--atra pariṇamatītyupacārapadaprayogaḥ tena pravartate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:105: niḥ śvāsena andhaḥ ādarśa iva candramā na prakāśate na dīpyate /
GK16visa04cu:107: tathā ca niḥ śvāsena aprakāśa ādarśa ivetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:108: nanu śakyatāvacchedakabhinnena aprakāśatvena rūpeṇa bodhanāt kathaṃ neyamarthāntarasakramitavācyalakṣaṇā
GK16visa04cu:110: yadi tadviśeṣo bhavet tadā eva arthāntarasaṃkramiti vācyalakṣaṇā /
GK16visa04cu:111: yathā ghaṭapadasya nīlaghaṭapadatve atra tu lakṣyatāvacchedakamaprakāśatvameva sāmānyam /
GK16visa04cu:112: andhatvameva tadviśeṣa iti ato na tathā iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:113: idaṃ tu prāyikameva na sārvatrikaṃ “rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe “ityatra duḥ khasahiṣṇutvarāmatvayoḥ karabhaḥ karabhaḥ ityatra śobhārāhityakarabhatvayośca tathātvābhāvāt /
GK16visa04cu:125: (vi, ca) bhama dhammia ityatrāpi viparīlakṣaṇābhramaṃ keṣāñcit nirasayitumāha---bhameti /
GK16visa04cu:126: bhrama dhārmika viśvastaḥ sa śvādya māritastena /
GK16visa04cu:129: godāvarī nadī tattīre kuñje kṛtaṃketāyāḥ tatraiva pratidinaṃ puṣpāvacayanena tatsaṃketabhañjakaṃ svapoṣitakukkuropadraveṇāpi anivṛttaṃ dhārmikaṃ prati utkirayam /
GK16visa04cu:132: atra “bhrama dhārmika--” ityato bhramaṇasya vidhiḥ prakṛte 'nupayujyamānatayā bhramaṇaniṣedhe paryavasyatīti viparītalakṣaṇāśaṅkāna kāryā /
GK16visa04cu:133: yatra khalu vidhiniṣaidhāvutpatsyamānāveva niṣadhavidhyoḥ paryavasyatastatraiva tadavasaraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:136: (vi, cha) bhramaṇavidhiḥ prakṛte anupapadyamānatayā iti---siṃhavattvena kathite svasaṃketasthale
GK16visa04cu:140: taddaśāyāṃ kvacit vidhiḥ niṣedhe kvacit niṣedho vidhau paryavasyatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:141: tatra taddaśāyāṃ vidheḥ niṣedhe paryavasānaṃ yathā--- aunnidṣaṃ daurbalyaṃ cintālasatvaṃ saniḥ śvasitam /
GK16visa04cu:142: mama mandabhāginyāḥ kṛte sakhi tvāmapi paribhavati //
GK16visa04cu:143: ityatra nāyikāyāḥ solluṇṭhavākye mama kṛte iti vidheḥ na mama kṛte iti lakṣaṇayā paryavasānam /
GK16visa04cu:144: niṣedhasya vidhau paryavasānaṃ yathā---“mā pathika rātryandha śayyāyāmāvayornimaṅkṣāsi
GK16visa04cu:145: “iti svayaṃ dūtikāyā uktau svaśayyāyāṃ gamananiṣedhasya svaśayyāyāmāgamanavidhau
GK16visa04cu:147: yattu niḥ śeṣacyutacandanamityādāvapi tadantikagamananiṣedhasya tadantikagamanavidhau lakṣaṇayā paryavasānamiti granthakṛtā pūrvamuktaṃ tanna
GK16visa04cu:148: tatra bhrama dhārmika ityādāviva prathamaṃ vācyaniṣedhasyaiva bodhāt uttarakālamevādhamatvokteścyutanirmṛṣṭapadagrīṣmakālapulakakathanāt
GK16visa04cu:150: ata eva kāvyaprakāśakṛtā tatra tadantikagamanavidheḥ vyaṅgyatvamevoktam /
GK16visa04cu:155: yatra punaḥ prakaraṇādiparyālocanena vidhiniṣadhayorniṣedhavidhī avagamyete tatra dhvanitvameva /
GK16visa04cu:162: tadvat ihāpi prathamaṃ bhramaṇavidhiḥ śaktyaiva pratīyate /
GK16visa04cu:163: paścādeva tasyāḥ kulaṭātvasya prakaraṇādinā pratītau bhramaṇaniṣedho vyañjanayaiva pratīyate,
GK16visa04cu:173: yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau ghoṣanivāsasya yathā vā “upakṛtaṃ bahu tatra kimucyate “ityapakāriṇaṃ pratyuktvā upakārasya ca prathamameva bādhyatayā khyātiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:177: uttaratra abhidhaiva tu ityuktyā niṣedhavidhyostu vyaṅgyatvameveti darśitam /
GK16visa04cu:180: yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti vyaṅgyārthasyāpyabhidhāne yatparatvena khyātasya bādhane 'pyabhidhāvyāpārasvīkārīt /
GK16visa04cu:194: ata eveti svārthaṃ svāśrayaśabdasya mukhyārthamajahatī upasthāpayantī ajahatsvārthā (rājadantādisamāsasiddha)
GK16visa04cu:195: naca kadalī kadalītyādau prathamakadalīpadenaiva sadalyā upasthitau tatra lakṣyārthasya jaḍatāyā abhedānvayasambhave kimarthaṃ kadalyaṃśe lakṣaṇeti
GK16visa04cu:209: vācyajñānāntaraṃ vyaṅgyajñānaṃ jāyate iti kramo yatra apariceya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:215: tatra ca rasavati kāvye jhaṭityāsvādaparyantagamanādvastvalaṅkārarūpavyaṅgyayorapi pratītirna vilambitā,
GK16visa04cu:220: eko 'pi bhedo 'nantatvāt saṃkhyeyastasya naiva yat // VisSd_4.5 //
GK16visa04cu:233: tathāhi---ekasyaiva “śṛṅgārasyaiko 'pi saṃbhogarūpo bhedaḥ parasparāliṅganādharapānacumbanādibhedāt pratyekaṃ ca nibhāvādivaicitryātsaṃkhāyatumaśkyaḥ,
GK16visa04cu:237: (vi, ḍa) eko 'pi bheda ityādikaṃ vyācaṣṭe--eṣu ceti /
GK16visa04cu:249: (vi, ḍha) lakṣyakramavyaṅgyadhvaniṃ vibhajati---śabdārthobhayeti--tatra anusvānasānnebha iti yaduktaṃ tad vyācaṣṭe---kramalakṣyatvādevānuraṇanarūpa iti /
GK16visa04cu:251: sa hi prathamadhvaneranantaraṃ jāyate tadutpattikramaśca lakṣyate tat tulyo yo vyaṅgyastasya traividhyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---tasya śabdaśaktyudbhavatvena iti /
GK16visa04cu:253: na tu abhidhārūpā vṛttiḥ tayā vyaṅgyābodhanāt arthasya tadabhāvācca /
GK16visa04cu:254: tena sāmarthyaina udbhava utpannaviṣayatā yasya tādṛśavyaṅgyasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:255: tat traividhyāt tatsambandhena saṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyanāmno dhvanikāvyasya traividhyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:270: (vi, ṇa) tatra kāvyasya śaktyutthatvaprayojakaṃ śabdaśaktyudbhavaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ dvidhā vibhajati---tatra vastvalaṅkārarūpatvāditi /
GK16visa04cu:271: pṛthak upādānāditi vastutvasya kevalānvayitvena alaṅkārasyāpi vastutvāt /
GK16visa04cu:275: alaṅkāraśabdasya puṃliṅgatvena tasya nañ tatpuruṣe liṅgatyāgābhāvāt /
GK16visa04cu:277: panthi a / ṇa ettha sattharamatthi maṇaṃ pattharatthale gāme /
GK16visa04cu:278: uṇṇaa paoharaṃ pekkhia ūṇa jai vasati tā vasasu //
GK16visa04cu:290: atra sattharādiśabdaśaktyā yadyupabhogakṣamo 'si tadāssveti vastu vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:293: (vi, ta) panthia ṇa ettheti-- “pathika nātra strastaramasti manāk prastarasthale grāme /
GK16visa04cu:297: he pathika / prastarasthale 'tra grāme manāk svalpamapi strastaraṃ śayanīyāstaraṇaṃ nāsti /
GK16visa04cu:298: prastara evaṃ vayaṃ svamipa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:300: unnatamudbhūtaṃ payodharaṃ meghaṃ prekṣya gamanapratibandhāt yadi vastumicchasi tadā vasa iti āpātato bhāvārthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:303: prakaraṇaniyantraṇavaśāt sor'tho vyaṅgyastathā ca “paradārānna gacchedi ti smṛtyādiśāstraṃ nāsti ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:305: tathā hi śayyāvirahāt prastarasthaṃ strījanaṃ puruṣo lātiratyarthaṃ gṛhṇāti iti prastarasthalaḥ
GK16visa04cu:306: tatra ityarthena uttuṅgastanadarśanena ca” yadyupabhogakṣametyādi“vyañjanāt paramparayā śabdaśaktimūlatā /
GK16visa04cu:311: kalpyate tadatra umāvallabha umāvallabha ivetyupamālaṅkāro vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:316: dvitīyārthaḥ pārvatyādiḥ tena sūcitaṃ pārvatīvallabhasya varṇṇanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:319: ataḥ kaverīśvarabhānudavayorupamānopameyabhāve tātparyyāt upamānopameyabhāvaḥ kalpyate saṃvyajyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:332: utkarṣabāhulyāt tvaṃ kīdṛśaḥ asatāmahitaḥ śatruḥ sādhuyaśobhiḥ sahitaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:341: hitena rahitaḥ kathaṃ tena yukta iti virodhaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:343: apiśabdasadbhāve“kupatimapi kalatravallabhamityādau apiśabdabalāt jhaṭiti viruddhārtha evābhāsate /
GK16visa04cu:345: amita ityādau tu aperabhāvāt prākaraṇikatayā prathamam aviruddhārtha eva pratibhāsate /
GK16visa04cu:346: anantaram amitaḥ sankathaṃ samiti iti virodhapratibhāsanād virodhābhāso vyaṅgya iti /
GK16visa04cu:347: apiśabdābhāvādityupalakṣaṇamaḥ anyeṣāmapi virodhabhidhāyi śabdānāmabhāve 'pi virodhābhāsasya vyaṅgyatvaṃ boddhavyam /
GK16visa04cu:352: (vi, dha) nanu vyaṅgyārtha eva āsvādyaḥ tasya śobhako yaḥ sa evālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:353: tathā ca upamādervyaṅgyatve pareṇa śobhyamāna eva saḥ na śobhakaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:354: tatkathamatra vyaṅgyopamāderalaṅkāratvamityata āha---vyaṅgyasyeti--alaṅkāryyatve vācyālaṅkārantareṇaiva śobhyatve 'pi ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:355: śramaṇaḥ sanyāsī taddaśāyāṃ tasya brāhmaṇyābhāve 'pi yathā tasya daśāntarīyaṃ brāhmaṇyamādāya
GK16visa04cu:358: vastu vālaṅkṛtirvāpi dvidhārthaḥ sambhavī svataḥ // VisSd_4.7 //
GK16visa04cu:359: kaveḥ prauṭhoktisiddho vā tannibaddhasya veti ṣaṭ /
GK16visa04cu:373: (vi, na) arthaśaktyudbhavaṃ darśāyituṃ vyañjakārthasya vastvalaṅkārarūpadvividhasya svataḥ sambhavitvāditrauvidhyena ṣaḍvidhatvamāha--vastu vālaṅkṛtirveti /
GK16visa04cu:383: kṣaṇamihāpyasmadgṛhe dāsyasi prāyeṇāsya śiśoḥ pitā na virasāḥ kaupīrapaḥ pāsyati /
GK16visa04cu:384: ekākinyapi yāmi satvaramitaḥ strotastamālākulaṃ nīrandhrāḥ tanumālikhantu jaraṭhacchedānalagranthayaḥ //
GK16visa04cu:387: (vi, pa) svataḥ sambhavivastuvyaṅgyaṃ vastvāha--dṛṣṭiṃ he iti /
GK16visa04cu:388: nadījalānayanavartmani vane kṛtasaṃketāyāḥ kulaṭāyāḥ tajjalānayanacchalena jigamiṣorbhāvinakhakṣatasamvaraṇoktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:390: asya madīyasya śiśoḥ pitā kulaṭātvāt svapatitvenānuktiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:391: virasāḥ svādārahitāḥ kaupīḥ kūpasambandhinīḥ apaḥ jalībhiprāyeṇa ityanena mama bādhyādinā aśaktidine pibatītyuktam /
GK16visa04cu:397: atra svataḥ sambhavinā vastunā tat pratipādikāyā bhāvaparapuṣopayogajanakhakṣatādigopanarūpaṃ vastumātraṃ vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:400: (vi, pha) svataḥ sambhavineti---asya ślokārthasyānalīkatvena pramāṇāntareṇāpi gamyatvasambhavāt /
GK16visa04cu:403: tasyāmeva raghoḥ pāṇḍyāḥ pratāpaṃ na viṣehire //
GK16visa04cu:404: atra svataḥ sambhavinā vastunā ravitejaso raghupratāpo 'dhika iti vyatirekālaṅkāro vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:414: atropamālaṅkāreṇa svataḥ sambhavinā vyañjakārthena baladevaḥ kṣaṇenaiva veṇudāriṇaḥ kṣayaṃ kariṣyatīti vastu vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:418: āpatantam āgacchantam amuṃ veṇudārināmāsuraṃ rāmo balarāmaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:419: veṇudāriṇaḥ kṣayamiti balopamānasya siṃhasya veṇudāryupamānamātrasaṃkṣayakaritvena tadupamānopameyayorapi taddharmalābhāt /
GK16visa04cu:423: atra svataḥ sambhavinā virodhālaṅkāreṇādharo nirdaṣṭaḥ śatravo vyāpāditāśceti samuccayālaṅkāro vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:427: yo rājā yudhi nijādharaṃ nirdaśan arivadhūjanasya oṣṭharūpāṇi vidrumasya pravālasya dalāni ratakālīnagāḍhakāntadaśanakṣatavyathārūpāt saṃkaṭādāpado 'mocayat /
GK16visa04cu:428: yudhi krodhena svādharaṃ nirdaśya tatpatiṃ hatvā tathā cakāretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:429: atreti---adharadaṃśakatvādharadaṃśamocakatvayoḥ vastugatyā avirodhe 'pi āpatato virodhasya ābhāsamānatvāt virodhābhāsālaṅkāreṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:431: cakāradvayasya samaṃ śabdasya vābhāvāt vyaṅgyaeva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:434: tathā hyatra svādharanirdaṃśanaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ vairistrīṇām oṣṭānāṃ ca kāntadantakṣatamocanaṃ kāryabhūtaṃ samakālatayā nirdiṣṭam /
GK16visa04cu:435: kiñcātra nirddaṃśanarūpakarapiśāco mamādharaṃ valirūpaṃ prāpyānyānadharān sukhinaḥ karotviti buddhvaiva
GK16visa04cu:436: nijādharaṃ daṣṭavāniti tasya rājñaḥ vuddhimapekṣya utprekṣā ca /
GK16visa04cu:443: (lo, u) sajjeti---“sajjayati surabhimāso na cārpayati yuvatijanalakṣyasahān /
GK16visa04cu:450: puṣpāṇi śarā iti kaviprauḍhoktisiddhaṃ vastu prakāśībhavan madanavijṛmbhaṇarūpaṃ vastu vyanakti /
GK16visa04cu:458: surabhimāso 'bhinavasahakāramukhān abhinavāni sahakārāṇi mukham ādiryeṣāṃ tādṛśān anaṅgasya śarān sajjayati /
GK16visa04cu:460: śarasajjanasya varttamānatvāt aniṣpannatvena tanniṣpattyānantarameva tādṛśalakṣyaśate 'rpayituṃ prerayiṣyati iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:463: anaṅgaśarān kīdṛśān-navapallavapattalān navapallavaiḥ pattalā patraracanā yeṣāṃ tādṛśān /
GK16visa04cu:465: vastuprakāśībhavaditi-- na ca surabhimāsādau śarakārādirūpakālaṅkāra eva prakāśībhavati ityato 'laṅkārasyaiva vyañjakatvamātreti vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:466: surabhimāsādau śarakārādyabhedāprakāśāt kintu surabhimāsādau kharasajjanādereva prakāśāt /
GK16visa04cu:474: he vīravimalabhānoḥ nirmalakiraṇasya candrasya karajālena bhuvanamaṇḍalaṃ dhavalayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:475: vyatirekālaṅkāra iti---adhikakālaṃ vyāpya prakāśanāt upamānāt candrakarāt ādhikyarūpa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:483: daśānanasya kirīṭebhyaḥ maṇivyājena maṇipatanacchalena rākṣasaśriyaḥ aśrubindavaḥ pṛthivyāṃ paryastāḥ patitāḥ /
GK16visa04cu:486: “dhammille navamallikāsamudayo haste sitāmbhoruhaṃ hāraḥ kaṇṭhataṭe payodharayuge śrīkhaṇḍalepo ghanaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:490: atra kaviprauḍhoktisiddhena rūpakālaṅkāreṇa bhūmiṣṭho 'pi svargasthānāmupakāraṃ karoṣīti vibhāvanālaṅkāro vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:496: eko 'pi tava kīrtirāśiḥ purandarapurīvāmabhruvāṃ surāṅganānāṃ vigrahe śarīre nānāmaṇḍanatāṃ yayau /
GK16visa04cu:504: sumukhai / yena tavādharapāṭalaṃ daśati bimbaphalaṃ śukaśāvakaḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:505: atrānena kavinibaddhasya kasyacitkāminaḥ prauḍhoktisiddhena vastunā tavādharaḥ puṇyātiśayalabhya iti vastu pratīyate /
GK16visa04cu:509: asau śukaśāvakaḥ kka nu śikhariṇi kasmin parvate kiyacciraṃ kimabhidhānaṃ kiṃ nāmakaṃ tapaḥ akarot /
GK16visa04cu:510: yena hetunā tava adharavat pāṭalaṃ bimbaphalaṃ daśāti /
GK16visa04cu:511: tava adharatulyavastudaṃśanamapi tapaḥ phalamiti ślokasya bhāvarathaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:516: vastunā śarāṇāṃ pañcatā śarān vimucya viyoginaḥ śriteve tyutprekṣālaṅkāro vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:525: sambodhanāt kāmuka evātra vaktā natu kaviḥ /
GK16visa04cu:532: atra kavinibaddhavaktṛprauḍhoktisiddhenotprekṣālaṅkāreṇa kāmasyāyamunmādakaḥ kālaḥ prāptastatkathaṃ mānini mānaṃ na muñcasīti vastu vyajyate
GK16visa04cu:539: ata eva kathaṃmānaṃ na muñcasi iti vyākhyā /
GK16visa04cu:545: (lo, ū) mahilāsahastrabharite tava hṛdaye subhaga sāmāntī /
GK16visa04cu:548: atrāmāantīti kavinibaddhavaktṛprauḍhoktisiddhena kāvyaliṅgālaṅkāreṇa tanostanūkaraṇo 'pi tava hṛdaye na vartata iti viśeṣoktyalaṅkāro vyajyate
GK16visa04cu:555: nāyakasya bahunāyikābhāvanāduḥ khena kṛśāyā nāyikāyā avasthāṃ nāyake kathayantyāstatsakhyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:556: mahilā strī tāsāṃ sahastreṇa bharite tava hṛdaye amāntī avakāśamalabhamānā sā anudinaṃ
GK16visa04cu:557: divasaṃ vyāpya ananyakarmmā tyaktānyakāryyā satī tanu svataḥ kṛśaṃ aṅgaṃ tanayati
GK16visa04cu:562: hṛdaye na varttate iti---tanayatīti varttamānanirddeśāt adyāpi hṛdaye vṛttyalābhaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:565: (lo, ṛ) atreti---rūpaṇādayaḥ kavervyāpārāḥ kaveśca prādhānyavyaṅgyabodhanārthā rūpaṇādayo vyāpārā yathātra camatkurvanti na tathā vācyeṣu /
GK16visa04cu:566: rūpakādyalaṅkāreṣu hi vācyānāṃ rūpyāṇāṃ mukhādīnāmeva rūpaṇādivyāpārād rūpakādibhyaścandrādibhyaśca prādhānyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:568: na khalu kaveḥ kavinibaddhasyeva rāgādyāviṣṭatā ataḥ kavinibaddhavaktṛprauḍhoktiḥ kaviprauḍhokteradhikaṃ sahṛdayavamatkārakāriṇīti pṛthakpratipāditā
GK16visa04cu:571: (vi, ka) nanu---prauḍhoktisiddhatvenaiva ubhayasaṃgrahasambhave kimarthaṃ kavinibaddhavaktṛkatvena pṛthagupādānamityata āha-na khalviti /
GK16visa04cu:578: gāḍhakāntadaśanetyādau darśitasya virodhālaṅkārasya vyañjakasya vācakāpikārābhāvād vyaṅgyatvameva,
GK16visa04cu:579: evaṃ sajjayati surabhimāsa ityādau vasantādeḥ śarakaraṇadirūpavastuno vyañjakasya vyaṅgyatvameva ityato 'tra prāyaśa iti pūraṇīyam /
GK16visa04cu:581: ata eva lakṣyavyaṅgyayorapi vyañjakatvamudāhāryyamiti tenoktam nanu rūpaṇameva rūpakālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:583: vyatirecanameva vyatirekālaṅkāraḥ tathā ca yatra rūpakālaṅkārasya vyaṅgayatvam tatra kiṃ rūpyamānavastūdāharaṇaṃ na syāt /
GK16visa04cu:585: evamutprekṣyamāṇavyatiricyamānavastunorityata āha--eṣu ceti--tattad vastavapekṣayā tadalaṅkāra eva ādhikacamatkārīti tattadudāharaṇameva tattat iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:587: diśi mandāyate ityatra vyatirekālaṅkāraśca vyaṅgya uktaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:588: rūpakālaṅkāra vyaṅgyatvaṃ tu noktaṃ tathāpi--- calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ spṛśasi bahuśo vepathumatī rahasyākhyāyīva svanasi mṛdu karṇāntikacaraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:589: karaṃ vyādhunvatyāḥ pibasi ratisarvasvamadharaṃ vayaṃ tattvānveṣānmadhukara /
GK16visa04cu:598: tattulyayuktike niḥ śeṣetyādau tadantikagamanaṃ lakṣyamityuktamitīdaṃ svoktiviruddham /
GK16visa04cu:608: śabdaśaktyutthe vyañjane tatprapañcasya arthaśaktyutthe vyañjane tatprapañcasya darśitatvāt /
GK16visa04cu:610: na tu darśayiṣyamāṇodāharaṇe 'laṅkārasya vyaṅgyatvāt alaṅkārarūpatayā eka ityukta iti kenaciduktaṃ yuktam /
GK16visa04cu:612: bata vīra / tava dviṣatāṃ parāṅmukhe tvayi parāṅmukhaṃ sarvam” //
GK16visa04cu:614: tvāmanuvarttate iti vastuvyañjanāyā api sambhavāt svataḥ sambhavyādyarthavyaṅgyatvena
GK16visa04cu:618: abhavatprasāditasuro mahotsavaḥ pramadājanasya sa cirāya mādhavaḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:621: (vi, ṅa) himamukteti---mādhavaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pramadājanasya mahotsavo mahotsave hetuścirāya abhavat /
GK16visa04cu:624: sapadmakaḥ padmayā lakṣmyā hastapādastharekhārūpapadmena vā sāhitaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:627: prasāditāḥ prīṇitāḥ surā devā yena tādṛśaśca /
GK16visa04cu:628: atra mādhavo vasanto 'pi śabdaśaktyā arthaśaktyā ca vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:629: tathā hi mādhavaśabdasya vasante 'pi śaktyā sapadmaka ityatra sapadmakaśabdarūpasya padmasahite 'pi śaktyā,
GK16visa04cu:630: dvijān ityatra dvijaśabdasya pakṣiṣvapi śaktyā janitamīnaketana ityatra surāprasādane 'pyasya śabdasya śaktyā ca vasantapratyāyane śabda śaktiḥ
GK16visa04cu:632: tataśca vasantasyāprākaraṇikatvena tatpratyāyanasya prakṛte 'nupayogād vasanta iva kṛṣṇa ityupamāpratītiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:635: atra mādhavaḥ kṛṣṇo mādhavo vasanta ivetyupamālaṅkāro vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:638: (lo, ṝ) himeti---himamuktacandra iva pakṣe himamuktacandreṇa ruciraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:645: atra mādhavaśabdapratipādyatayā harivasantayoḥ aupamyapratipādakasya himamukta ityādiśabdasya śabdaparivṛttisahatvādarthaśakterdārḍhyam /
GK16visa04cu:647: evaṃ ca vyaṅgyabhedādeva vyañjakānāṃ kāvyānāṃ bhedaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:663: (lo, ḷ) śabdaparivṛttisahatvāsahatvābhyāmeva hi sarvatra śabdārthaśaktimūlatvasya vyavasthāpanam /
GK16visa04cu:664: ata eva cāsya bhedasya bahupadaniṣṭatvenaiva sambhavābhiprāyeṇa granthakṛtpadaniṣṭatvaṃ nāstīti vakṣyati /
GK16visa04cu:666: “pathia ṇa ettha“ityādau parivṛttyasaha eva strastarapayodharaśabdayoreva vyañjakatvamiti śabdaśaktimūlatvam /
GK16visa04cu:672: (vi, cha) vākya iti---ubhayaśaktyuttho vyaṅgyo vākyamātravyaṅgya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:674: tadanye iti---tadanye vyaṅgyāḥ padena vākyena ca vyaṅgyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:678: “dhanyaḥ sa eva taruṇo nayane tasyaiva nayane ca /
GK16visa04cu:683: (vi, ja) dvijīyanayataśabda iti---atra lakṣyārthasya atiśayo vyaṅgya iti vakṣyati /
GK16visa04cu:688: atra pratipādyasya saṃmukhīnatvādeva labdhe pratipādyatve tvāmiti punarvacanamanyavyāvṛttiviśiṣṭaṃ tvadarthaṃ takṣayati /
GK16visa04cu:690: tathā viduṣāṃ samavāya ityanenaiva vaktuḥ pratipādane siddhe punarvacmīti vacanamupadiśāmīti vacanaviśeṣarūpamarthaṃ lakṣayati /
GK16visa04cu:692: etena mama vacanaṃ tavātyantaṃ hitaṃ tadavaśyameva kartavyamityabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:717: anyeṣāṃ tu tadupakāritvameveti tanmūlaka eva dhvanivyapadeśaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:724: na tu vyaṅgyam kintu vipralambha eva vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:725: tadādyanekapadānāṃ cātra na vākyatvaṃ vibhinnavākyasthatvena parasparānanvayāt /
GK16visa04cu:726: na ca tadā sudhāspadamabhūdityatra sarveṣāṃ tadādipadārthānāmanvayāt vākyatvameveti vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:727: tallāvaṇyamityanenaiva vipralambhavyañjanena tadā sudhāspadamityanvayāpekṣāṃ vinaiva vyañjaktvena padatvenaiva vyañjakatvāt /
GK16visa04cu:744: (vi, ṭha) śabdaśaktyudbhavaṃ vastupadavyaṅgyamāha---bhuktimuktikṛditi---upanāyakāgamanaṃ dṛṣṭvā santoṣaṃ vyañjayantyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:759: atra sadāgamaśabdaḥ sannahitamupanāyakaṃ prati sacchāstrārthamabhidhāya sataḥ puruṣasyāgama iti vastu vyanakti /
GK16visa04cu:766: nanu sadāgamaḥ sadāgama iveti na kathamupamādhvaniḥ ?
GK16visa04cu:778: tasyā āsvādyatvābhāvāt tadupamāyā api anāsvādyatvena tāvatā sambandhīkaraṇasyāpi anupayogāt /
GK16visa04cu:781: rājate ko 'pi jagati sa rājā puruṣottamaḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:789: asya padasyāpi śaktyā vyaṅgyatve 'pi na vākyavyaṅgyatvaṃ puruṣottamapadaśleṣādhīnapratītikatvādasya śliṣṭārthasya /
GK16visa04cu:790: upamādhvaniriti--asya puruṣottamapadasya saṅgopanādiprayojanakatvābhāvena upamāyāmeva tātparyyātsaṃlakṣyakramabhedau vastvalaṅkārau /
GK16visa04cu:793: āścaryaṃ tava saukumāryamabhitaḥ klāntāsi yenādhunā netradvandvamamīlanavyatikaraṃ śaknoti te nāsitum” //
GK16visa04cu:797: snānavartmani upanāyakopabhuktāṃ snātāgatāṃ klāntāṃ saśīṃ prati sakhyā upahāsoktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:803: nanu snānāduttaraṃ muhūrttadvayātmakasāyaṃkāle ātapasattvāt tata eva klama ityatrāha--yāto 'steti /
GK16visa04cu:808: nanu klamaḥ kathaṃ jāta ityatrāha--yenādhunā iti /
GK16visa04cu:809: yena klamena tava netradvandvam amīlanavyatikaraṃ mīlanasambandharahitaṃ yathā syāttathā āsituṃ sthātuṃ na śakroti /
GK16visa04cu:811: (lo, o) sāyamiti---na vidyate mīlanena vyatikaraḥ samparko yatra tat amīlanavyatikaraṃ yathā syāttathā'situṃ sthātumityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:813: atra svataḥ saṃbhavinā vastunā kṛtaparapuruṣaparicayā klāntāsīti vastu vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:815: na tu pūrvaṃ kadācidapi tavaivaṃvidhaḥ klamo dṛṣṭa iti bodhayato 'dhunā padasyaivetarapadārthotkarṣādasyaiva padāntarāpekṣayā vaiśiṣṭyam /
GK16visa04cu:824: pūrvavarṇṇitavyavasāyād anyā gopakanyakā nirucchvāsatayā niruddhapraṇavāyutayā muktiṃ gatā /
GK16visa04cu:826: jagatsūtiṃ jagajjanakaṃ śrīkṛṣṇaṃ tathāpi samastapāpapuṇyakṣaye eva muktirityatastadupapādayati--tadaprāptīti--taccinteti ca /
GK16visa04cu:829: na tasya prāṇā utkāmanti tatraiva samavalīyante; iti śruteḥ /
GK16visa04cu:834: atra ca vyañjakasya kaviprauḍhoktimantareṇāpi saṃbhavātsvataḥ saṃbhavitā /
GK16visa04cu:837: (vi, da) atreti---tadaprāptiduḥ khasya taccintāhlādasya copabhogena tajjanakapāpapuṇyayoreva kṣayaḥ sambhavati;
GK16visa04cu:843: yathā kamalamanambhasītyatra anukte upameye mukhe upamānakamalāropaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:844: prakṛtānītyatra upameyāni anuktāni uktasukhaduḥ khadūyaṃ cāprakṛtatvāt upamānāni atastadāropādatiśayoktidvayam /
GK16visa04cu:848: atra aśeṣacayapadayorekavākyasthatve 'pi dvābhyāṃ vyaṅgyadvayavyañjanānnaikavākyatvena vyañjakatvamataḥ padatvenaiva vyañjakatvam
GK16visa04cu:853: atra paśyantīti kaviprauḍhoktisiddhena kāvyaliṅgālaṅkāreṇa na ke 'pyanye dātārastava sadṛśā iti vyatirekālaṅkāro 'saṃkhyapadadyotyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:857: tvaddānajalavāhinyā nadyā asaṃkhyapathagāmitvadarśanāt pathatrayagāminyā gaṅgāyā lajjayā śivāśirasi ātmagopanam /
GK16visa04cu:861: tadevaṃ dhvaneḥ pūrvokteṣvaṣṭādaśasu bhedeṣu madhye śabdārthaśaktyuttho vyaṅgyo vākyamātre bhavannekaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:862: anye punaḥ saptadaśa vākye pade ceti catustriṃśaditi pañcatriṃśadbhedāḥ /
GK16visa04cu:868: tadaprāptimahāduḥ khetyādiślokadvayasya mahāvākyatve 'pi tatra vyañjakapadadvayasattvāt tadvyaṅgyasyaivodāharaṇatvena taddarśitam /
GK16visa04cu:875: priyo vā yadi vā dveṣyaḥ prāṇināṃ gatirīdṛśaī” //
GK16visa04cu:879: asya ca ślokasya padyāntarasacivasyaiva mahāvākyateti spaṣṭārtham /
GK16visa04cu:882: iti divā prabhavato gṛdhrasya śmaśāne mṛtaṃ bālamupādāya tiṣṭhatāṃ taṃ parityajya gamanamiṣṭam /
GK16visa04cu:885: (vi, pa) alaṃ sthitvetyati---śmaśāne mṛtabālakam atyajatastadvandhūn prati gṛdhravākyamidaṃ ślokadvayarūpaṃ mahāvākyam /
GK16visa04cu:888: tathā ca bālakaṃ tyaktvā yūyaṃ gacchadhvamiti vastu svataḥ sambhavivastunaḥ uktaprabandhārthasya vyaṅgyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:895: iti niśi samarthasya gomāyordivase parityāgo 'nabhilaṣita iti vākyasamahena dyotyate /
GK16visa04cu:901: vahuvighna iti--tathā ca vighnaśūnyamuhūrttāntare jāvanasambhāvanā darśitā /
GK16visa04cu:906: tathā ca ātrāpi svataḥ sambhavinā etatprabandhārthena vālakaparityāgānabhilāṣarūpaṃ vastu vyajyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:913: ataḥ svataḥ sambhavinā vastunā vasuta vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:914: udāhāryyamiti--tathā ca raghuvaṃśe“samayujyata bhūpatiryuvā“ityādinā“ubhayāṃ siddhimubhāvavāpatuḥ“ityante tulyayogitayā kāvyaliṅgena vā raghurāghavayorvyatirekālaṅkāraḥ pratīyate /
GK16visa04cu:918: yathā māghakāvye śiśupāladūtoktau sandhau kāvye vastumātrarūpo vigrahaḥ upamādhvanirapi tathāvidhaḥ sambhāvyate /
GK16visa04cu:936: “calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ spṛśasi bahuśo vepathumatīṃ rahasyākhyāyīva svanasi mṛdu karṇāntikacaraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:937: karaṃ vyādhunvatyāḥ pibasi ratisarvasvamadharaṃ vayaṃ tattvānveṣānmadhukara /
GK16visa04cu:939: atra “hatāḥ” iti na punaḥ “duḥkhaṃ prāptavantaḥ” iti hanprakṛteḥ /
GK16visa04cu:942: (vi, bha) calāpāṅgāmitiḥ śakuntalāṃ vyākulayantaṃ bhramaraṃ prati duṣyantasyoktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:945: kiṃ vā tasya puṣṭakanyātvena matpariṇayayogyā ityevaṃ tattvasyānveṣaṇādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:950: (lo, i) padāṃśe iti--iha yadyapi prakṛtyādeḥ kevalasya na vyañjakatvam,
GK16visa04cu:953: tathā hyatra hatā ityasya sthāne ktapratyayaṃ sthāpayitvā hanaḥ sthāne prakṛtyantaraniveśane na tathā pratītiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:956: mukhamaṃsavivarti pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kathamapyunnamitaṃ na cumbitaṃ tu” //
GK16visa04cu:960: (vi, ma) muhuraṅgulīti---śakuntalāṃ prāpya tatsambhogavighne sati anutapyasānasya duṣyantasya uktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:963: atreti---nañā eva cumbanābhāvalābhe tuśabdena cumbasya atyantavyavacchedalābhāt vipralambhānutāpātiśayo vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:977: bahuvacanasyeti---mama eko 'pyarirnāsti bahu tatsattve sambhāvite viṣādaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:986: tathā hi--yadi luṇṭhane svargo 'pi svalpagrāmaḥ kapratyayavaśāt cātyantasvalpaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:990: nari nari kirati drāk sāyakān puṣpadhanvā puri puri ca nivṛttā māninīmānacarccā //
GK16visa04cu:994: (lo, ī) nyakkāra ityādau udāharaṇadvaye padāṃśavyañjakatvasya prakṛtatve 'pi prasaṅgāt padavyañjakatvakathanam /
GK16visa04cu:996: “rāmo 'sau bhuvaneṣu vikamaguṇaiḥ prāptaḥ prasiddhiṃ parāmasmadbhāgyaviparyayādiha paraṃ devo na jānāti tam /
GK16visa04cu:997: vandī vaiṣa yaśāṃsi gāyati marut yasyaikabāṇāhataśreṇībhūtaviśālaśālavivaroktīrṇaiḥ svaraiḥ saptabhaiḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:999: bhuvaneṣvityatra bahuvacanena guṇairityatra prakṛtyā bahuvacanena ca /
GK16visa04cu:1000: te te viśeṣā asmad bhāgyaviparyayādityatra ca na tava na mama kintvasmākaṃ sarveṣāmapi bhāgyaviparyayādityasmadbhāgyaviparyayādityatra na khalvabhāgyāt kintu bhagyaviparyayāt /
GK16visa04cu:1002: saṃprati tu anavadhānena tasya viparyayo jāta iti pratipādanādātmānā pratipādanena ca te te sahṛdayasaṃvedyā arthāḥ pratīyante /
GK16visa04cu:1003: tathā saktotphulletyādau hareḥ paśyata ityatrānādaraṣaṣṭhyā kiñca na kevalaṃ rasādidhvanereva padāṃśaprakāśatā,
GK16visa04cu:1011: nāsāgre nayanaṃ tadetadaparaṃ yaccaikatānaṃ manaḥ . maunaṃ cedamidaṃ ca śūnyamadhunā yadviśvamābhāti te,
GK16visa04cu:1017: (vi, ra) āhāre iti--dhyāyantīṃ viyoginīṃ yogadharmiṇīṃ dṛṣṭvā kasyacidiyaṃ pṛcchā /
GK16visa04cu:1020: tava sthāne yadā viśvaṃ śūnyamābhāti ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1025: ābhāti” ityupasargasya “sakhi” iti praṇayasmāraṇasya “asi bhoḥ” iti sotprāsasya “kiṃ vā” ityuttarakṣadārḍhyasūcakasya vāśabdasya,
GK16visa04cu:1033: na tu yat kiñcidviṣaye etad viśeṣaṇasya samāsapadaikadeśaḥ,
GK16visa04cu:1041: āṅupasargeṇa mithyātvarūpaṃ samyak pratibhāti iti bhāvabodhanāt vipralambhavyañjanam /
GK16visa04cu:1042: praṇayasmaraṇasyeti--tena dṛśyamāno vipralambho na tvayā gopanīya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1076: dvādaśapadaikadeśādivyaṅgyāḥ catvāra ityekapañcāśat eṣāṃ parasparayojane saṃkhyāṃ
GK16visa04cu:1078: aṅgāṅgitvarūpeṇa ekāśrayānupraveśarūpeṇa saṃdigdharūpeṇa ca trividhena saṃkareṇa yojane tasya trirūpatā /
GK16visa04cu:1083: ebiryāḥ saṃkhyā bhavanti tā āhavedeti---“aṅkānāṃ vāmataḥ krama';
GK16visa04cu:1089: ekasyaiva svajātīyena ekena svasvajātīyaiḥ pañcāśatā ca caturguṇane ekasyaiva caturadhikadviśatarūpatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1090: evaṃ taduttarasya pūrveṇa saha cāturvidhyaṃ pūrvagaṇanāyāṃ praviṣṭamityataḥ tasya cāturvidhyasya agaṇyatvāt tasya dviśatarūpatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1091: evaṃ taduttarasya pūrvaddhābhyāṃ catuścaturvidhatvasya agaṇyatvāt caturnyūnadviśatarūpatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1092: evaṃ rītyā caramasya caturūpatvamātraṃ guṇyamiti bhavatyuktarūpā saṃkhyā /
GK16visa04cu:1093: kāvyaprakāśe tu darśitakrameṇa kramaśo hrasamāvicāryya sarveṣāmeva caturadhikadviśatarūpatvena ekapañcāśata eva tādṛśasaṃkhyātvena “vedakhāgniviyaccandrāḥ';
GK16visa04cu:1095: vastutastu atyantavicāre vedakhāgniśararūpā yā saṃkhyā granthakṛtā darśitā sāpi na sambhavati /
GK16visa04cu:1096: tathā hi ekapañcāśata eva uktacāturvidhyaṃ na sambhavati,
GK16visa04cu:1103: (lo, ū) tadevamiti---evaṃ vyaṅgyasya padavākyagatatveṅgavṛttau pañcatriṃśadbhedāḥ saṃkhyātāḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1105: rasasya padāṃśavarṇaracanāprabandhagatatvena catvāra iti militvā dhvanikāvyasya ekapañcaśadbhedāḥ śuddhā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1108: saṃsṛṣṭyā cānyo 'nyamiśraṇe śuddhabhedānāmeva pañcāśataḥ sambhūya vedāścatvāraḥ,
GK16visa04cu:1114: tathā hi prathamabhedasya sajātīyamiśraṇe catvāro bhedāḥ;
GK16visa04cu:1115: vijātīyaiḥ pañcāśatā pratyekaṃ dhvaninā vimaśraṇe catvāro bhedāḥ iti militvā caturadhikaṃ bhedaśatadvayaṃ dvitīyasya bhedaśatadvayameva /
GK16visa04cu:1119: evaṃ tṛtīye 'ṣṭau caturthe dvādaśa iti krameṇānyeṣāmapi svakīyādyabhedāpekṣayā sarveṣāṃ bhedacatuṣṭayapātanam /
GK16visa04cu:1122: pañca agrayaḥ trayaḥ sāyakāḥ pañca evaṃ pañcasahastrāṇi śatatrayaṃ pañcāśat pañca ca;“5355“
GK16visa04cu:1123: jratra agrimāgrimabhedasya yojane ekaikabhedahrāsāt evaṃ prakāreṇa evaṃ yojanaṃ bhavati /
GK16visa04cu:1136: (vi, ṣa) atyunnateti---pravāsādāgacchantaṃ patiṃ dvāri sthitvā dṛṣṭavatīṃ nāyikāṃ kasmiṃścinnivedayataḥ kasyaciduktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:1151: tathā nistandra unnidraḥ candraḥ tādṛśavadanāyāḥ yad vadanāravindaṃ tasya saurabhyaṃ saugandhyaṃ tasya sauhṛdena saṃparkeṇa sagarvāḥ samīraṇā yatra tādṛśāni /
GK16visa04cu:1152: atreti candrasya nidrābhāvāt tandrāpadasyāprakāśe lakṣaṇā samīraṇasyotkṛṣṭatvaṃ tadvyaṅgyam,
GK16visa04cu:1153: tathā samīraṇasya garvābhāvāt utkṛṣṭe lakṣaṇā sukhasparśatvaṃ tadvyaṅgyam /
GK16visa04cu:1157: alidhvanicandrasamīraṇaiḥ kāmoddīpakaiḥ vyaṅgyasya śṛṅgārasya apyatra pratītirityatastasya
GK16visa04cu:1158: candrojjvalatvena samīraṇotkṛṣṭatvena tasya sukhasparśatvena ca lakṣaṇāmūlakavyaṅgye
GK16visa04cu:1162: yathā--- khaṇapāhuṇiā deara jāāe kiṃ pide bhāṇiā /
GK16visa04cu:1165: kṣaṇaprāghuṇikā devara jāyayā kimapi te bhaṇitā /
GK16visa04cu:1168: gṛhapatiprasaktāmupanāyikāmutsave tadgṛhāgatāṃ tatpatnyā bhartsitāṃ paścāt gṛhe rudatīmanunetuṃ gṛhapatijyeṣṭhabhrātṛpatnyāḥ sopahāsoktiriyam
GK16visa04cu:1169: atra kṣaṇa utsavastatra prāghuṇakā abhyāgatā utsavāgatetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1170: taddevara sā te tava jāyayākimapyapriyaṃ bhaṇitā satī paścādvalabhīgṛhe roditīti /
GK16visa04cu:1175: ayaṃ kiṃ svataḥ sambhavivastuvyaṅgyavastudhvaniḥ kiṃvā anunayapade upabhogalakṣaṇā;
GK16visa04cu:1176: tadvyaṅgya tasyāḥ duḥ khāpasāraṇamityayamarthāntarasaṃkramitavācyalakṣaṇā mūladhvaniriti dhvanyoḥ saṃśayāspadatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1195: bhedāstasyoditi iti--tasya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyakāvyasya evamaṣṭavidhavyaṅgyabhedāt tasyāṣṭau bhedā uditā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1197: (lo, ṝ) evaṃ dhvanyākhyaṃ kāvyasya bhedaṃ nirupya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyamavatārayati atheti--tatra syāditi---kākkā ākṣiptaṃ vācyavat sphuṭīkṛtam /
GK16visa04cu:1211: (vi, ka) rasāderaṅgaṃ rasādi ityubhayatra ādipadāt bhāvādyaṅgatāpi rasādeḥ,
GK16visa04cu:1213: ayaṃ sa iti---bhūriśravasaḥ samarapatitaṃ hastamādāya rudatyāstatpatnyā uraktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:1214: atreti---rasotkarṣaṇādinā vyaṅgyaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ mṛtālambanakatvena rasatāmanāpanno mṛtālambanakasya karuṇasyāṅgam /
GK16visa04cu:1215: rasatāpannasya tasya śṛṅgāreṇa prakarṣaṇāt pūrvānubhūtasukhasmaraṇe hi karuṇaprakarṣaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1219: rasaśabdenātra bhāvādīnāmupagrahaḥ ādiśabdena vācyasyāṅgam utkarṣakārirasādi atrādiśabdādanuraṇanarūpam /
GK16visa04cu:1225: hā /hā/ kathaṃ nu bhavato ripurājadhānīprāsādasaṃtatiṣu tiṣṭhati kāmilokaḥ //
GK16visa04cu:1231: bhavato ripurājadhānīprasādasantatiṣu kathaṃ kamilokastiṣṭhati iti anvayaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1234: tādṛśasandiviśiṣṭānāṃ ripurājadhānīkāmilokānāṃ śocyāvasthājñāturvaktuḥ śokarūpaḥ karuṇo rājaviṣayaratibhāvasyāṅgamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1236: śokavyañjaka iti granthakṛto 'bhiprāyaḥ tadaiva vyaṅgyabhūtasya hāhāśabdapratipādyasya śokarūpakaruṇasya vyaṅgyatvopapatteḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1243: “janasthāne bhrāntaṃ kanakamṛgatṛṣṇāndhitadhiyā vaco vaidehīti pratipadamudaśru pralapitam /
GK16visa04cu:1244: kṛtālaṅkābharturvadanaparipāṭīṣu ghaṭanā māyāptaṃ rāmatvaṃ kuśalavasutā na tvadhigatā” //
GK16visa04cu:1249: mayā rāmatvaṃ prāptaṃ rāmasadṛśo 'haṃ jāta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1251: mayā kanakarūpayā mṛgatṛṣṇayā marīcikāyāndhitadhiyā janānāṃ sthāne bhrāntam asāre
GK16visa04cu:1253: mayā vai iti sambodhya pratipadaṃ sthāne dehīti vacaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1254: mayā bharttuḥ īśvarasya paripāṭīṣu paricaryyāsu aṃlamityarthakā ghaṭanā na kṛtā tadvat
GK16visa04cu:1255: rāmeṇāpi laṅkābharttuḥ rāvaṇasya vadanānāṃ mukhānāṃ paripāṭyāṃ paripāṭanasya nimittamiṣughaṭanā kṛtā //
GK16visa04cu:1256: kintu kuśalaṃ dāridṣāpanāyakaṃ vasu dhanaṃ yasya tādṛśatā tu mayā na prāptā /
GK16visa04cu:1257: atra tuśabdena rāmavāk chedāt rāmeṇa tu kuśalavasutā prāptā ityarthaḥ pratīyate--tatra ca kuśalavau sutau yasyāstādṛśī sītetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1259: (lo, e) aṅgaparipoṣakatvād vācyāṅgabhūtamanuraṇanarūpaṃ śabdaśaktimūlamudāharati-evaṃ ca rasabhāvāderaṅgaṃ rasabhāvādi,
GK16visa04cu:1269: kābharttuḥ kutsitasvāminaḥ yad vadanaṃ tasya paripāṭīṣu paramparāsu laṅkābharttuḥ rāvaṇasya
GK16visa04cu:1270: vadanānāṃ mukhānāṃ paripāṭyāṃ paṅktau iṣughaṭanā śarayogaśca /
GK16visa04cu:1271: kuśalam āyatiśuddhaṃ vasu dhanaṃ yasya evaṃbhūtatā,
GK16visa04cu:1272: kuśalavau sutau yasyāḥ sā sītā ca /
GK16visa04cu:1279: (vi, gha) atra viṣādādhikyavyañjakayā kuśalavasutāprāptyā prāptatatkāt rāmāt upamānād vailakṣaṇyarūpo vyatirekālaṅkāraḥ naño vācyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1281: tadaṅgamiti manasikṛtya vyaṅgyasya sādṛśyasya agūḍhatvāt guṇībhūtatvamupapādayitumāha--atra rāmatvamiti /
GK16visa04cu:1286: tadāropaśca sādṛśyamūlakaḥ ityāha---sādṛśyaheturiti---āviṣkurvātā vaktrā tad gopanaṃ dhvanitvahetutadrūḍhatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1288: yadyapi ekaśabdarūpaṃ sādṛśyaṃ śrotragrāhyameva na tu vākyaṃ,
GK16visa04cu:1290: tathāpi śabdasya sādṛśyatvena rūpeṇa vyaṅgyatvameva na śrotragrahyatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1292: na ca tad gopanāt agūḍharūpaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprabheda evāyamiti vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:1296: na tu rāmavyatirekasyānvayaniṣpādakatayā abādhitatvena tad vināpi tanniṣpatteḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1302: ekaviśeṣaṇenāpi tad ghaṭanasambhave bahuviśeṣaṇasambhavāttatprakarṣakatvamapi labhyate tacca sahṛdayaikavedyam /
GK16visa04cu:1304: (lo, ai) atreti vacane tu rāmo 'smītyuktvā punaḥ sādṛśyahetukatādātmyaropaṇaṃ janasthāna ityādi vacanapratipādanenāpi labhyam /
GK16visa04cu:1308: vyaṅgyamiti pāṭhe tu sugamā eva vyākhyā /
GK16visa04cu:1314: “mathnāmi kauravaśataṃ samare na kopādduḥśāsanasya rudhiraṃ na pibāmyutarastaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1315: saṃcūrṇayāmi gadayā na suyodhanorūṃ sandhi karotu bhavatāṃ nṛpatiḥ paṇena” //
GK16visa04cu:1316: atra mathnāmyevetyādivyaṅgyaṃ vācyasya niṣedhasya sahabhāvenaiva sthitam /
GK16visa04cu:1321: mathnāmīti---duryoghanena saha sandhikaraṇe pravṛttaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraṃ śrutvā kuddhasya bhīmasya sahadevaṃ pratyuktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:1322: bhavatāmityanena asmākam asamīhitakāritvāt nāsmākaṃ nṛpatiriti sūcitam /
GK16visa04cu:1326: tayā vyañjanayā aparanañor'thopasthāpanāt na mathnāmītyartho labhyate /
GK16visa04cu:1341: (vi, ca) vācyasiddhyaṅgamudāharati---anupannasya vācyārthasya yad vyaṅgyānvayenaiva siddhiḥ tādṛśaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ vācyasiddhyaṅgam /
GK16visa04cu:1344: anvayasāya vairikulasya vaṃśapadavācyasya veṇutvaropaṇarūpo vyaṅgaya iti kulaveṇudvayārthakasya
GK16visa04cu:1345: vaṃśapadasya prakaraṇāt kule niyantraṇena veṇo stad vyaṅgyatvena tadrūpaṇasyāpi vyaṅgyatvāt
GK16visa04cu:1346: davānalatvāropasiddhyaṅgamiti kule davā nalavādhena veṇāveda tad bādhāt /
GK16visa04cu:1348: yadi prakaraṇavaśāt anekārthasya vaṃśapadasya prathamaṃ kulabodhakatvam;
GK16visa04cu:1349: tadaiva veṇurūpor'tho vyaṅgyo bhavati tadeva tu na;
GK16visa04cu:1351: kintu kulaveṇyorubhayorekadā eva davānalānvayārthaṃ tātparyyād vaṃśayorupasthityā arthadvayameva vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:1352: natu veṇurūpor'tho vyaṅgyastathā ca paramparitarūpamevedaṃ veṇutvarūpaṇasya davānalarūpaṇakāraṇatvāt tad vakṣyati svayameva--- “yatra kasyacidāropaḥ parāropasya kāraṇam /
GK16visa04cu:1358: “iti atra hi rājamaṇḍalasya grāsakarūpasambandhitayā rāhuvādhāt bāhau rāhurūpaṇamanupapannamato nṛpamaṇḍale candramaṇḍalatvasyāropo bāhau rāhurupaṇakāraṇamiti
GK16visa04cu:1359: ata eva kāvyaprakāśakṛtāpi sadvaṃśamuktāmaṇirityatra rājño muktāmaṇyāropaṇasya satkule bādhāt satkule saha veṇuropaṇaṃ tatkāraṇamityuktam /
GK16visa04cu:1363: na hi dīpayan ityādau āhave jagaduddaṇḍetyādau ca ekasya vācyasiddhyaṅgatvamanyasya paramparitarūpakatvamityatravinigamakaṃ nāsti /
GK16visa04cu:1365: darśanena bhavataḥ kiṃ tṛptirutpadyate kintvevaṃ vijanasthagrerhatajanaḥ sambhāvayatyanyathā /
GK16visa04cu:1370: madvidhanāyikādarśanenāpi dhairyyacyutarahita ityevaṃvidhāyāḥ bhaṅgyāḥ pratītyaiva siddhayati /
GK16visa04cu:1371: na ca nṛpamaṇḍale candramaṇḍalāropaṇamapi vyaṅgyaṃ sadevālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1374: prathamaṃ nṛpamaṇḍale rāhoranvayāsambhāvena rājamaṇḍalapadādekadaiva nṛpacandramaṇaaḍalayoḥ upasthityā drayorapi vācyatvācca /
GK16visa04cu:1375: nanu tatkatham--- bhramimaratimalasahṛdayatāṃ praṇayaṃ mūrcchāṃ tamaḥ śarīrasādam /
GK16visa04cu:1376: maraṇaṃ ca jaladadabhujagajaṃ prasahya kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām /
GK16visa04cu:1377: “ityatra viśeṣajale rūpetaṃ halāhalaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ bhujagarupaṇasiddhikṛdityuktyā halāhalasya vyaṅgyatvamuktvā kāvyaprakāśakṛtā vācyasiddhyaṅgodāharaṇatvena taduktamiti cenna /
GK16visa04cu:1378: tatra uddīpakatayā prākaraṇikamanekārthasya viṣaśabdasyārtho jalam ityato 'prākaraṇikaṃ halāhalaṃ vyaṅgyamityuktam /
GK16visa04cu:1379: na ca dīpayannityatrāpi prākaraṇikatvena vaṃśapadārthakulavācyaṃ veṇustu aprākaraṇiko vyaṅgya eveti vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:1380: davānalarūpaṇasyāpi tātparyyaviṣayatvena tasya kule bādhena tadupapādanatayā veṇorapi prākaraṇikatvāt /
GK16visa04cu:1383: bhramimaratimityādau tu jalade bhujagarūpaṇaṃ śyāmatvenāpakāritvena ca jale halāhalarūpaṇaṃ vināpi āpātataḥ siddhatyeveti halāhalamaprākaraṇikamityato vyaṅgyameva /
GK16visa04cu:1384: parantu praṇidhāne sati jalasya bhujagajanyatvāsambhavena bhajagarūpaṇāsiddhyā tatsiddhikāritvena paścājjale halāhalarūpaṇamiti /
GK16visa04cu:1392: kiṃ vācyārthena kiṃ vā vyaṅgyārthena vyañjito 'yaṃ ityevaṃ sandehaviṣayatvaṃ tattvam /
GK16visa04cu:1393: halastviti kumārasambhave ākālike vasante jāte sarveṣāmeva kāmodreke sati halasyāpi kiñcit tathātvavarṇanamidam /
GK16visa04cu:1397: cumbanābhilāṣastu vyaṅgyaḥ taddvayamapi śṛṅgāranubhāvastat kena raso vyañjita iti sandehāt /
GK16visa04cu:1400: dhairyyaparivṛtteḥ kiñcittvena cumbanābhilāṣo jāto na vā;
GK16visa04cu:1401: iti sandehena nadīyarasavyañjakatāyā api tadadhīnasandehāt ata eva vācyārthena tadvyañjanamapi saṃdigdhameva /
GK16visa04cu:1407: atra paraśurāmo rakṣaḥkulakṣayaṃ kariṣyatīti vyaṅgyasya vācyasya ca samaṃprādhānyam /
GK16visa04cu:1410: (vi, ja) tulyaprādhānyamāha---brāhmaṇeti---digvijaye paraśurāmaṃ jigīṣuṃ rāvaṇaṃ prati tadamātyasya tattrāsakavākyamidam /
GK16visa04cu:1411: bhavatāmeva bhūtaye na tu svārtha bravīmītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1421: atreti--atra vācyavyaṅgyayoḥ sāmadaṇḍayostulyatayaiva vairamocane paryyāptātvādaprastutapraśaṃsāvat parasparānapekṣayā camatkārāspadatvāt dvayorapi samaṃ prādhānyam /
GK16visa04cu:1425: atrāllāvadīnākhye nṛpatau dānasāmādimantareṇa nānyaḥ praśamopāya iti vyaṅgyaṃ vyutpannānāmapi jhaṭityasphuṭam /
GK16visa04cu:1429: jhaṭityasphuṭamiti tat praśamopāyo nāstyeva iti hi vyaṅgyamāpātataḥ pratibhāti /
GK16visa04cu:1439: atra pratīyamāno 'pi śākyamunestiryagyoṣiti bālātkāropabhogaḥ sphuṭatayā vācyāyamāna ityagūḍham /
GK16visa04cu:1444: ahaṃ vratavatīti dharmopadeśinaḥ asya upabhogo mama vratabhaṅgāya no bhaviṣyatītyato 'haṃ vratavatyeva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1445: svairaṃ svacchandam ataḥ param uktena kiṃ prayojanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1447: pratīyamānasya prāyaśo 'sphuṭatvena sphuṭatve tad virodhe 'trāpikāraḥ sphuṭatayeti---prabandhaślokātprakaraṇavaśād balātkaropabhogajñānāt sphuṭatā
GK16visa04cu:1452: prajjvālitasya rajanīṃ madanānalasya dhūmaṃ dadhat prakaṭalāñchanakaitavena” /
GK16visa04cu:1453: atra cumbīti pade vadanasaṃsargarūpasāyarthasyāsambhavāt saṃsargamātraṃ lakṣyaṃta tadatiśayaścābhidheyavat sphuṭaṃ pratīyate /
GK16visa04cu:1457: atra dattasaṃketaḥ jaścillatāgṛhaṃ praviṣṭa iti vyaṅgyāt “sīdantyaṅgani” iti vācyasya camatkāraḥ sahṛdayasaṃvedya ityasundaram /
GK16visa04cu:1465: vānīrakuñje kṛtasaṃketāyā gṛhakarmavyāpārāt tatra gantumaśaktāyā vadhvā aṅgāvasādavarṇanamidam /
GK16visa04cu:1466: atreti--praviṣṭa ityantamātraṃ na vyaṅgyaṃ vadhvāstatrāgamanasyāpi tadīyapakṣikolāhalaśravaṇādhīnāṅgāvasādena vyaṅgyatvāt /
GK16visa04cu:1467: tathā ceti--vyaṅgyādityatra ityādi vyaṅgyādityarthaḥ vācyasya camatkāra iti vadhvā vipralambhavyañjakatvena hyatra camatkāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1471: vadhvā īdṛśakāryyatyāgenāpi tatrāgamanasambhavādṛte vācyāṅgāvasādamukhaprekṣatvena tasya nyūnacamatkāritetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1477: kiñca yo dīpakatulyayogitādiṣūpamādyalaṅkāro vyaṅgyaḥ sa guṇībhūtavyaṅgya eva /
GK16visa04cu:1481: tatparatvaṃ na kāvyasya nāsau mārgo dhvanermataḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:1484: (vi, ṭha) asundarasya bahūnyudāharaṇāni sambhavantīti darśayitumāha---kiñca yo dīpaketi /
GK16visa04cu:1489: alaṅkārāntarasyāpi pratītau satyāṃ yaccālaṅkārāntaraṃ bhasata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1493: yatreti pāṭhe tu yatra kāvye bhāsate ityalaṅkāra iti kartṛpadamadhyāhāryyam /
GK16visa04cu:1495: (lo, u) idānīmanyatrāpi vyaṅgyasya guṇībhāvasthale dhvanibhramaṃ nirasyan āha---kiñceti /
GK16visa04cu:1497: kāvyasya ca tatparatvaṃ na bhāsata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1503: hi dhvanitvaṃ tad viparyyāso vyaktīkāraṇaṃ yatra śabdāntarādinā kriyate so 'gūḍharūpaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprabheda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1507: goparāgahṛtayā kiṃcinna dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tenātra skhalitāsmi nātha /
GK16visa04cu:1509: ekastvaṃ viṣameṣu khinnamanasāṃ sarvābalānāṃ gatir- gopyevaṃ gaditaḥ saleśamavatādroṣṭhe harirvaściram” //
GK16visa04cu:1512: (vi, ḍha) dṛṣṭyeti---keśavaṃ dṛṣṭvā madanāndhatayā goṣṭe patitāyā gopyāḥ saleśaṃ saśleṣaṃ gadito hariściramavatāt /
GK16visa04cu:1513: dṛṣṭyetyādi--saśleṣoktiḥ tatra vācyārtho yathā---he keśava gavāṃ parāgeṇa rajasā hṛtayā naṣṭayā dṛṣṭyā mayā kiñcit na dṛṣṭam /
GK16visa04cu:1516: he nātha / patitāṃ māṃ kiṃ nālambase /
GK16visa04cu:1517: kathamālambiṣye ityatrāha---ekastvamiti---viṣameṣūñcanīceṣu vartmasu khinnamanasāṃ patnena klāntahṛdayānāṃ sarvābalānāṃ sakalabalarahitānāṃ strīṇāṃ puṃsāṃ ca yatastvaṃ gatiriti /
GK16visa04cu:1519: rāgeṇa tvayyanurāgeṇa hṛtayā dṛṣṭyā mayā kiñcinnijatiroṣādikaṃ na dṛṣṭam /
GK16visa04cu:1521: he nātha / patitāṃ patibhāvaṃ bharttṛtvaṃ kiṃ nāma nālambase nāśrayasi /
GK16visa04cu:1522: yato viṣameṣuṇā pañceṣuṇā khinnamanasāṃ sarvāsām abalānāṃ tvameko gatiriti /
GK16visa04cu:1524: (lo, ū) dṛṣṭyeti---gavāṃ parāgeṇa rajasā hṛtayā tiraskṛtayā /
GK16visa04cu:1525: gāḥ indriyāṇi sambhāgadānādinā pātīti gopaḥ tasmin gope tvayi,
GK16visa04cu:1526: rāgeṇa pramṇā hṛtayā vaśīkṛtayā skhalitā bhraṣṭapādā gatadhairyyā ca /
GK16visa04cu:1527: atha patitāṃ mārgapatitāṃ dhavatvaṃ ca nāvalambase na dhārayasi na parigṛhaṇāsi ca /
GK16visa04cu:1532: atra goparāgādiśabdānāṃ gope rāga ityādivyaṅgyārthānāṃ saleśamiti padena sphuṭatayāvabhāsaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1535: (vi, ṇa) sphuṭayeti---śleṣavaśādeva tatpratīteḥ saleśapadena tat sphuṭīkaraṇam /
GK16visa04cu:1537: na tvanaucityapravarttitarūparasābhāsaḥ tad gopane 'pi paranāyakaviṣayatvena tadavaśyaṃbhāvāt /
GK16visa04cu:1541: yatra vastvalaṅkārasādirūpavyaṅgyānāṃ rasābhyantare guṇībhāvastatra pradhānakṛta eva kāvyavyavahāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1544: (vi, ta) kvacittu vyaṅgye guṇībhūte 'pi dhvanikāvyavyavahāra eva na guṇībhūtavyavahāra ityāha---kiñcātra yatra vastviti /
GK16visa04cu:1547: na cedaṃ kathamupapadyate īdṛśasthale 'parāṅgākhyaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyasyaivoktatvāt iti vācyam,
GK16visa04cu:1548: yatra guṇībhūtānāmalaṅkārasādīnāmaṅgijanakatvameva natvaṅgi prakarṣakatvaṃ tatraivāṅgino vyañjakaviśeṣaṇatvenāṅgina eṣa camatkāritvāt dhvanivyavahārat
GK16visa04cu:1549: yathā ca calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭimityatra madhukarakāmukarūpālaṅkārasya vyaṅgyasya hatā iti
GK16visa04cu:1551: yathā--- “jāne kopaparāṅmukhī priyatamā svapne 'dya dṛṣṭā mayā mā māṃ saṃspṛśa pāṇineti rudatī gantuṃ pravṛttā tataḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1552: no yāvat parirabhya cāṭukaśatairāśvāsayāmi priyāṃ bhratastāvadahaṃ śaṭhena vidhinā nidrāharidrīkṛtaḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:1553: ityatra vidhiṃ pratyasūyādhvanireva śaṭhapadena vyañjakaviśeṣeṇa vyaktaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1554: no yāvadāśvāsayāmi ityanena vyaṅgyasya vipralambhasya tu asūyājanakatvameva nāsūyāprakarṣakatvamityato nāparāṅgatvamityādi svayamūhyam /
GK16visa04cu:1557: pradhānena rasenaiva kāvyavyavahāro na tu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyena /
GK16visa04cu:1558: tathā ca tatrottamakāvyatvameva ityarthaḥ yathā“ayaṃ sa rasanotkarṣo“tyādaveva hi tatra śṛṅgārasya guṇībhāve 'pi taṃ bhāgamavalambya madhyamakāvyavyavahāro 'pi na karttavyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1567: kvacittu prakāraṇagmye vastuni tātparyyasattvena aṅgībhūtarasādau tātparyyābhāve 'pi āpātataścamatkāribhistairaṅgabhūtai rasādyaireva parāṅgavyavahāra ityāha /
GK16visa04cu:1573: (vi, da) yatra tu yatronmadānāmiti---atra pure 'bhraṃlihaḥ meghasparśo śoṇamaṇīmayūkhaḥ padmarāgamaṇīnāṃ raśmiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1574: sandhyābhramaṃ tādṛśaraśmisañcaraṇādeva sandhyākāle iti bhrāntiṃ prāpnuvatāmunmadānāṃ madanamattānāṃ pramadājanānāmanaṅganepathyavidhiṃ kāmasambhogaveśaṃ vidhatta ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1581: (vi, dha) atra hi prakaraṇāt purāprakarṣe tātparyyasattvena anaṅganepathyavidhānavyaṅgyasya śṛṅgārasya tātparyyaviṣayatvābhāve 'pi āpātataścamatkāritvalābhenaivāparāṅgavyavahāraḥ
GK16visa04cu:1585: kālāntare tu prakaraṇādiparyālocanayā bhavannapyasau na kāvyavyavadeśaṃvyāhantumīśaḥ,
GK16visa04cu:1593: tatra āpātatastadananubhave 'pi uttarakālaṃ prakaraṇādiparyyālocanayā purīprakarṣaprādhānyāvagamo bhavannapi kāvyasya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyavyapadeśaṃ vyāhantuṃ neśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1596: tathāca apradhānenāpi śṛṅgāreṇā'svādāt na guṇībhūtavyaṅgyavyapadeśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1610: tanna, yadi hi avyaṅgyatvena vyaṅgyābhāvastadā tasya kāvyatvamapi nāstīti prāgevoktam /
GK16visa04cu:1613: (vi, pa) kāvyaprakāśakṛtā citrākhyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kāvyamucyate taddūṣayitumāha---keciditi /
GK16visa04cu:1617: saguṇāviti taiḥ kāvyalakṣaṇe kṛte vyaṅgyarasadvāreṇaiva ca saguṇatvena vyaṅgyābhāve saguṇatvābhāvāt kāvyatvaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1631: āsvādyavyaṅgyatve eva kāvayatvāṅgīkārāt idaṃ ca svakapolakalpitaṃ dūṣaṇam /
GK16visa04cu:1633: nanu āsvādye eva tāratamyānna prācīnadvayāntarbhāva ityata āha---yadi cāsvādyatvamiti---tadā kṣudratvameveti---prācīnabhedadvayāt asyālpatvamevetyarthaḥ
GK16visa04cu:1634: astu tāvat kṣudratvaṃ tu kāvyatvāprayojakatvenānupādeyatvādanāsvādyatvameva ityāha---kṣudratāyāmiti---tathā ca dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyaṃ dvayameva kāvyam /
GK16visa04cu:1635: citrākhyaṃ padyaṃ na tu kāvyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1646: evamuktaprabandhena vyaṅgyasya pradhānaguṇabhāvābhyām ubha eva kāvye vyavasthite /
GK16visa04cu:1648: tatra kāvyavyavahārastu sādharmyād gauṇa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1654: ucyate vakṣyate ca--tasya ca vyaṅgyasya prādhānyāprādhānyābhyāṃ dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyau dvau bhedau,
GK16visa04cu:1655: tayorapi pratyekaṃ vyaṅgyasya vastvalaṅkārasarūpatvena traividhyamityuktaprakāreṇātmanā eva ātmano bhedaḥ prabhedaśca /
GK16visa04cu:1656: iti durupapādaḥ sāmānyalaśraṇaśca vyāpteḥ iti cet;
GK16visa04cu:1657: atrocyate-yadi vayaṃ rasavattvākhyasya kāvyasāmānyalakṣaṇasya vastvalaṅkāravyaṅgyayoḥ kāvyabhedayorabhāvaṃ brūmaḥ tadaiṣa
GK16visa04cu:1668: ata evāhuḥ---rasādyapekṣayā tu sarvaguṇābhāvavyabhicāra eva iti /
GK16visa04cu:1669: nanu tarhi kathaṃ niḥśeṣacyutacandanamityādau vastudhvaneḥ prādhānyaṃ,
GK16visa04cu:1670: tatra hi dautyakarmajīvikāyāṃ kṛtaghnāyāṃ tvayi tasmin adhame śaṭhe ca mama nāsūyā,
GK16visa04cu:1677: nanvevamalaṃ yathākathañcit prādhānyamupakalpya vastvalaṅkārarūpayordhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyoḥ kāvyavyavahārapravarttakoktyā rasadhvanināpi sa nivarttatāmiti cet,
GK16visa04cu:1678: atrāha kāvyaprakāśakāraḥ---“samanantaroktaṃ yadyapi sa nāsti kaścidviṣaya iti /
GK16visa04cu:1679: pradhānaṃ cāpātamātreṇa āparyantaṃ pradhānena rasena eva vyapadeśaḥ” /
GK16visa04cu:1680: tathā tenaivoktamalaṅkāraprastāve---“rasādirūpastadvyaṅgyor'tholaṅkārāntaraṃ ca sarvatrāvyabhicārītyagaṇayitvā eva tadalaṅkārā udāhṛtāḥ” /
GK16visa04cu:1684: yatra khalu samāsoktyādyalaṅkāreṣu vyaṅgyasya vaiṣadyenāpi pratītiḥ,
GK16visa04cu:1690: kiñca kvacit kadācit yatrālaṅkāre vyaṅgyasyāsvādaprakarṣakatvena prādhānyamapi yathāprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ---
GK16visa04cu:1691: “jaṃ vellihiṇa ma asi jaṃ cāsi paraviraṃ pilaghemaṃ /
GK16visa04cu:1692: tamaṇḍe kohali ajjaṃ valaṃ piphuli haṃsi” //
GK16visa04cu:1693: ityādāvacamatkāraiṇaḥ kuṇḍākarṣaṇārthāt prastutāt gṛhakarmaratyā yuvānaṃ prati nāyikāyā aprasaṅganiṣedhāya prastutasya bālāyā yauvanodbhedakathanasya tasya dhvanau antarbhāvo 'stu,
GK16visa04cu:1695: evaṃ cālaṅkāreṣu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasyāntarbhāve eṣa eva nyāyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1696: kiñca dīpakatulyayogitādau yeyamupapādyālaṅkāṇṇāṃ pratītirna tatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyākāvyabhedāntaḥ pāto 'nāsvādyatvāt vyaṅgyasya,
GK16visa04cu:1698: ata eva kavipratibhāsaṃrambhagocaratvaṃ teṣu nāstīti vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:1700: kintu vācyāpekṣayā āsvādapakarṣa iti teṣu ucito guṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyakāvyavyavahāraḥ /
